name: extract_calculation_input
description: extract the mathmatical functions and two numberic numbers

function.description: The name of the mathmatical functions and operation. 1. For mathmatical function, pls use postgresql  mathematical Functions name as standard name. here is the example for name, abs, cbrt, div, exp, factorial, log, log10, ln, mod, pi, power,round, sqrt.  2. For mathmatical operation, pls use postgresql mathmatical operation description as name, such as Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication, Division, Modulo, Exponentiation, Square root, Cube root. 3. if both mathmatical function and operation has name, use postgresql mathmatical function name.
